Easy to learn the basics of the game. Takes a lifetime to master. Fun and challenging at the same time. I would highly recommend purchasing a microphone for call outs. Your team mates will be happy if you do :) CS isn't your typical strategy FPS. Play smart. Health doesn't regenerate. Practice makes perfect. My only complaint would be the occasional cheater. Good luck and have fun!
Incroyale, excellemment excellent, What a great game
Besides the cheaters and toxic people in the game it is pretty fun to have with friends.

This game is very well designed for a shooter game. The maps present in the game are all very fun to play. Also, this game is very competitive when it comes to shooting as well as intellectual skills. So play this game like you want to and have fun with your friends.
